TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseWheelEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 提供各種事件的資料，報告滑鼠裝置之滑鼠滾輪差異值的變更。

span.span: Provides data for various events that report changes to the mouse wheel delta value of a mouse device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用以搭配下列事件： is used with the following events: - - - （附加的事件） (attached event) - - - （附加的事件） (attached event) 屬性是正數，如果向上移動滑鼠滾輪時或 （開使用者） 或負數向下移動滑鼠滾輪時前後 （向使用者）。The property is positive if the mouse wheel is moved upward or forward (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is moved downward or backward (toward the user). 即使對於小型滑鼠滾輪移動會引發這個事件。This event is raised even for small mouse wheel movements. 某些情況下，很適合實作節流小滑鼠滾輪差異檢查差異是否超過某個臨界值的處理常式。For some scenarios, it is appropriate to implement handlers that throttle small mouse wheel deltas by checking whether the delta exceeds a certain threshold. 否則，您可能會叫用所在很小，不會更新任何的 UI 繫結至滑鼠滾輪移動滑鼠滾輪差異的情況下的處理常式。Otherwise, you might invoke your handler for cases where the mouse wheel delta was so small that any UI that is tied to the mouse wheel movement would not update. 完全如何處理常式中實作的臨界值的行為和臨界值應該是適用於完全實作。Exactly how you implement the threshold behavior in a handler and what that threshold should be is entirely implementation-specific. ## Examples 下列範例會移動向上如果滑鼠滾輪是正面的且移動下如果滑鼠滾輪是負數。The following example moves a up if the mouse wheel is positive and moves the down if the mouse wheel is negative. 附加至。The is attached to a . [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousewheeldelta)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousewheeldelta)]

param.name: mouse
param.span: 與這個事件相關聯的滑鼠裝置。

span.span: The mouse device associated with this event.
The time when the input occurred.
The amount the wheel has changed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Delta As Integer
public: property int Delta { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指出滑鼠滾輪的變更量。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the amount that the mouse wheel has changed.
The amount the wheel has changed.

value.span: 這個值在滑鼠滾輪向上旋轉 (遠離使用者) 時為正值，在滑鼠滾輪向下旋轉 (朝向使用者) 時則為負值。

span.span: This value is positive if the mouse wheel is rotated in an upward direction (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is rotated in a downward direction (toward the user).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的上限和下限範圍，這個值可能來自裝置實作或其他呼叫端引發事件，並因此未定義。The effective upper and lower ranges of this value potentially come from device implementations or other callers that raised the event, and are therefore not defined. ## Examples 下列範例會移動向上如果滑鼠滾輪是正面的且移動下如果滑鼠滾輪是負數。The following example moves a up if the mouse wheel is positive and moves the down if the mouse wheel is negative. 附加至。The is attached to a . [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousewheeldelta)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousewheeldelta)]

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
